```{r}
questions %>%
  left_join(clients, by = c("AskedByClientUno" = "ClientUno", "StateAbbr")) %>%
  group_by(StateAbbr) %>%
  mutate(
    is_null = 1 * (TakenByAttorneyUno == "NULL"),
  ) %>%
  count(is_null) %>%
  pivot_wider(
    names_from = "is_null",
    names_prefix = "null",
    values_from = "n"
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    null_percent = null1 / (null0 + null1)
  ) %>%
  # arrange(desc(null_percent)) %>%
  rename(state = StateAbbr) %>%
  plot_usmap(regions = "states", values = "null_percent") + 
  # labs(title = "US States",
  #      subtitle = "This is a blank map of the counties of the United States.") + 
  scale_fill_continuous()
  # theme(panel.background = element_rect(color = "black", fill = "lightblue"))
```

```{r}
questions %>%
  left_join(clients, by = c("AskedByClientUno" = "ClientUno", "StateAbbr")) %>%
  group_by(StateAbbr) %>%
  mutate(
    is_null = 1 * (TakenByAttorneyUno == "NULL"),
  ) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  # group_by(is_null) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(aes(
    x = StateAbbr,
    fill = is_null,
    group = is_null
  ), position = "dodge")
```
